name: KittyDice
description:
RULES: After automatically generated dice will roll player can first move horizontally and then vertically. Kitty should earn a yarn to pass the level.  

This is a game for GMTK 2022

Name : "KittyDice"

controls: W,A,S,D

Members:

DAVIT JGUSHIA - Game designer/Developer

IAMNIKITA - Sound Designer

HAKU - Visual artist
